amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that Article 5 of the North Atlantic Treaty does not supersede the constitutional requirement that Congress declare war before the United States engages in war.

action.text: Amendment SA 222 under the order of 7/19/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 16 - 83. Record Vote Number: 191.
